story.text: FRANKFURT Jan 2 Car maker DaimlerChrysler's DCXGn.DE premium Mercedes arm said on Tuesday it would recall almost 130,000 vehicles in Germany due to possible problems with windscreen wipers. A spokesman said Mercedes models of the A and B-Class as well as estate cars of the C-Class made between May 2005 and May 2006 were affected. He added a switch would be removed on these cars due to a possible lack of insulation.
story.title: mercedes recalls 130 , 000 vehicles in germany
